vote.motion-ch: 動議中止議程文件FCR(2018-19)73的討論
vote.motion-en: Motion that discussion on FCR(2018-19)73 be now adjourned

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2018-19)73 – EC(2018-19)17人事編制小組委員會在2018年12月19日所提出的建議 – 在律政司民事法律科和法律草擬科各開設1個首席政府律師常額職位
vote.motion-en: FCR(2018-19)73 – EC(2018-19)17 RECOMMENDATION OF THE ESTABLISHMENT SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 19 DECEMBER 2018 – Creation of two permanent posts of Principal Government Counsel (DL3), one each in the Civil Division and the Law Drafting Division of the Department of Justice

vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure
